name: Repulsar (Blanche)
description:
This galaxy is too small...

The game

Repulsar is a local multi-player game up to 4 players using XBox360 and/or XBoxOne gamepads.

Each player controls a planet and must push the others outside the borders of game space, the last one alive wins!

Repulsar draws inspiration from a variety of games such as Asteroids and Super Smash Bros Brawl. This game allows you to play with the universe as if it was a billiard!

The project

This is a follow-up to Global Game Jam 2017.

In its actual form it's a prototype made in 5 weeks thus it could be a little rough but it's playable and most importantly enjoyable!

This game may get updates to reflect your feedback and enhance the overall experience.
